lines.text: What if... there was a different fire?
Yeah- something smaller and less destructive.
Maybe they wanted to hide the result of that smaller fire, so they started a larger fire for it to blend into!
That way, it wouldn't look like it was specially targeted, and we wouldn't find it suspicious!
I like that line of thinkin', but you don't got much in the way of support.
If you can come up with somethin' more specific, maybe we can get somewhere.
...And that's if I'm even on the right track at all.
